Result.Abstract: This study compared the adequacy of 5 theories to predict dropping out of high school before the 10th grade. These theories include full mediation by academic achievement and direct effects related to general deviance, deviant affiliation, family socialization, and structural strains. Result.Title: Predictors of Early High School Dropout: A Test of Five Theories
